name: Cappuccino
description: A classic Italian coffee drink made with espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam. Standard coffee drink in Italy.

name: Espresso
description: A strong and concentrated coffee brewed by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.

name: Latte
description: A creamy coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk, often topped with a small amount of milk foam.

name: Americano
description: A simple coffee drink made by diluting espresso with hot water, resulting in a similar strength to brewed coffee.
